name: Baturi Mini Bars - Bold Flavored Cold Processed Soap
description:
If you like Bold Flavor in your bath bar, our 3 oz mini bar is your choice. Like our Natural Bath Bars, our minis are naturally colored with oxides, herbs, and clays, and contain our signature blend of Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, and shea butter. With these bars, however, we've added fragrance oils for a longer lasting scent. 

We offer the following flavors:

Acai Papaya
Brown Sugar Fig w/Goats Milk
Green Clover Field
Midnight Jasmine
Oatmeal Milk and Honey w/Goats Milk
Pomegranate Pear
Sandalwood Vanilla

Any item not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.

options.name: Oatmeal Milk and Honey W/Goats Milk

name: Baturi Bath Bars - All Natural Cold Processed Soap
description:
A Baturi Bath Bar is STEP 1 in maintaining your healthy skin and hair. Made with natural ingredients, these bars are the perfect choice to nurture sensitive skin.


Baturi Bath Bars are approximately 4oz. and are available in the following scents. See Bath Bar Ingredients page for full list of ingredients.

Unscented Castile w/Goats Milk
Lavender Oatmeal w/Goats Milk
Super Shea
Frankincense and Myrrh
Fresh Ginger Lime
Lemongrass
Peppermint Tea Tree
Spearmint
Vanilla Ylang Ylang

Any scent not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.

name: Natural Washcloths and Soap Savers
description:
Natural Ramie Washcloth

This wonderful washcloth is the perfect addition to your bath time experience. These natural Ramie washcloths provide an almost massaging gentle exfoliation with each wash. We recommend that you wash them before use.


Natural Ramie Soap Saver

This soft, Ramie soap bag creates a wonderful lather when a soap bar is placed inside the bag, and gently exfoliates the skin. Custom blend Essences and/or use even the smallest remnants of your Baturi Bath Bars by combining small pieces in your soap saver.


Any item not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.

name: Natural Wood Bath Bar Decks
description:
Our Bath Bar Decks are as Beautiful as they are functional. We highly recommend using our deck to prolong the life of your bath bar. When using handmade bath bars you must always keep them dry between uses.

Styles include:

Ladder Style
Block Style

Any item not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.

name: TheraMist Aromatherapy for Home, Hair, and Body
description:
Baturi's water based refresher is STEP 2 to maintaining your healthy skin and hair. Our TheraMists can be used as a body mist, linen spray, or diffuser blend.

To use as a hair and body refresher, cleanse with your Baturi Bath Bar, then mist your hair and/or body BEFORE applying Baturi Massage Oil and/or Hair and Body Butter.

BE Love: A warm, sensual blend of patchouli and ylang ylang.

BE Peace: The soothing scent of lavender.

BE Joy: The energizing boost of sweet orange and grapefruit.

Just BE: A Balancing blend of peppermint, rosemary, lavender, cedar wood, and eucalyptus.

Any item not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.

name: Organic Massage Oils for Hair and Body
description:
Baturi Massage Oil is STEP 3 to maintaing healthy hair and skin. Our oils are made with the purest, edible ingredients, including organic therapeutic grade essential oils. 

Apply Baturi Massage Oil to your skin and/or hair after misting with Baturi TheraMist for the ultimate Aromatherapy experience.


BE Naked: A blend of nature's purest organic ingredients with no added essential oils, created for the most sensitive skin. Ingredients: Organic extra virgin olive oil infused with BE 7 organic  herb blend.
 
BE Love: This warm blend is both grounding and sensual. Patchouli is great for stress and exhaustion and connects us to our Spiritual selves while the ylang ylang works to calm and soothe… and both are well known aphrodisiacs. Ingredients: Organic extra virgin olive oil infused with BE 7 organic herb blend, organic patchouli essential oil, and organic ylang ylang essential oil.
 
BE Peace: This relaxing blend, rich with Lavender, assists in calming your spirit and soothing your soul. This well known tension reliever works on headaches, anxiety, and both physical and emotional irritability. Ingredients: Organic extra virgin olive oil infused with BE 7 organic herb blend and organic lavender essential oil. 

BE Joy: This antidepressant, anti-inflammatory, and all around smile inducing blend of grapefruit and sweet orange is sure to lift your Spirit and keep you glowing all day. Ingredients: Organic extra virgin olive oil infused with BE 7 organic herb blend, organic sweet orange essential oil, and organic grapefruit essential oil.
 
Just BE: Custom designed to bring you clarity and equilibrium. Peppermint and Rosemary to invigorate you, lavender to relieve stress and clear your inner visions, eucalyptus to cleanse you of negative energy, and cedar wood to open you mentally and connect you to your spirit. Ingredients: Organic extra virgin olive oil infused with BE 7 organic herb blend and the organic essential oil blend of peppermint, lavender, rosemary, eucalyptus, and cedar wood.
 
Any item not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.

name: Whipped Organic Shea Butter for Hair and Body
description:
Baturi Hair and Body Butter is STEP 3 to maintaining your healthy skin and hair. We've harnest the power of nature's purest ingredients to nourish even the most sensitive skin and fragile hair.

Apply Baturi Hair and Body Butter to your skin and/or hair after misting with Baturi TheraMist for the ultimate Aromatherapy experience.

BE Naked - Kenya's Sweet Buttercream: A blend of nature's purest organic ingredients with no added essential oils, created for the most sensitive skin. Ingredients: Organic, unrefined and fairly traded shea butter from Togo, organic fresh pressed coconut oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, and vitamin E.
 
BE Love: This warm blend is both grounding and sensual. Patchouli can eliminate stress and aid in Spiritual grounding while the ylang ylang works to calm and soothe the senses… and both are well known aphrodisiacs. Ingredients: Organic, unrefined and fairly traded shea butter from Togo, organic fresh pressed coconut oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic patchouli essential oil, organic ylang ylang essential oil and vitamin E.

BE Peace: This relaxing blend, rich with Lavender, assists in calming your spirit and soothing your soul. This well known tension reliever works on headaches, anxiety, and both physical and emotional irritability. Ingredients: Organic, unrefined and fairly traded shea butter from Togo, organic fresh pressed coconut oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic lavender essential oil and vitamin E. 

BE Joy: This antidepressant, anti-inflammatory, and all around smile inducing blend of grapefruit and sweet orange is sure to lift your Spirit and keep you glowing all day. Ingredients: Organic, unrefined and fairly traded shea butter from Togo, organic fresh pressed coconut oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic sweet orange essential oil, organic grapefruit essential oil and vitamin E.
 
Just BE: Custom designed to bring you clarity and equilibrium. Peppermint and Rosemary to invigorate you, Lavender to relieve stress and clear your inner visions, eucalyptus to cleanse you of negative energy, and cedar wood to open you mentally and connect you to your spirit. Ingredients: Organic, unrefined and fairly traded shea butter from Togo, organic fresh pressed coconut oil, organic extra virgin olive oil, the organic essential oil blend of peppermint, lavender, rosemary, eucalyptus, and cedar wood, and vitamin E.
 
Any item not listed below is sold out. Please check back soon.
